name: Stade-Bützfleth
author: Daniel Zwick
body:
Historie

The pre-investigations with side-scan sonar for the planned extension of the Bützfleth port facility has lead to the discovery of an entirely preserved shipwreck from the 17th century. The wreck is still in situ, but it is planned to salvage the wreck and put it on museum display.

Beschrijving

Lengte46 voet (14 m)
